Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, I need to identify which activities recur in the same case. Looking at the log, Verify Documents, Call Customer, and Adjust Account appear multiple times within individual cases.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Starting with Verify Documents: In Case C001, it occurs twice. The first time, the BackOfficeAgent checks identity documents but finds something missing, leading to a call. The second time, after the customer submits additional docs, they re-check. So the context here is initial verification vs. re-verification after additional info. Renaming these to Initial Document Verification and Additional Document Verification makes sense.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Next, Call Customer in C001 is a call to request missing documents, while in C002, the first call is to clarify an account discrepancy, and the second is a follow-up to confirm adjustments. Similarly, in C003, the call is to ask the customer to return. So each call has a different purpose: requesting info, clarifying details, follow-up confirmation, and recalling customer. Renaming these based on the purpose would disambiguate them.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then Adjust Account in C002 and C003: In C002, it is adjusting details after a discrepancy call, while in C003, it is a correction due to missing info. Maybe renaming to Account Adjustment Post-Discrepancy and Account Correction for Missing Info would clarify.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I also need to check if other activities repeat. Initiate Request and Approve Request do not repeat within cases, so they can stay as-is.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Now, applying these renames to each case: For C001: First Verify Documents Initial Document Verification Second Verify Documents Additional Document Verification Call Customer Outbound Call: Request Missing Documents For C002: First Call Customer Outbound Call: Clarify Account Discrepancy Adjust Account Account Adjustment Post-Discrepancy Second Call Customer Follow-Up Call: Confirm Adjustments For C003: Call Customer Outbound Call: Recall Customer to Branch Adjust Account Internal Account Correction: Missing Info Verify Documents (after adjustment) Post-Correction Document Re-Verification

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Justifications would reference the context clues like the reason for the call or the stage of verification. Ensuring each renamed activity clearly states its purpose within the workflow. I should present the revised log with these new names and briefly explain each change based on the context provided in the Additional Context column.
